event.description: Dee Gordon strikes out swinging.
J. T. Realmuto walks.
Christian Yelich singles on a ground ball to center fielder Adam Eaton. J. T. Realmuto to 3rd.
Giancarlo Stanton strikes out swinging.
Justin Bour walks. Christian Yelich to 2nd.

Marcell Ozuna singles on a ground ball to center fielder Adam Eaton. J. T. Realmuto scores. Christian Yelich scores. Justin Bour out at 3rd, center fielder Adam Eaton to third baseman Anthony Rendon to shortstop Trea Turner to third baseman Anthony Rendon.
Derek Dietrich hit by pitch.
Adeiny Hechavarria strikes out swinging.
Dan Straily out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Matt Wieters to second baseman Daniel Murphy. Derek Dietrich to 2nd.
Dee Gordon hit by pitch.
With J. T. Realmuto batting, wild pitch by Tanner Roark, Derek Dietrich to 3rd. Dee Gordon to 2nd.
J. T. Realmuto grounds out, shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Christian Yelich grounds out, second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Giancarlo Stanton grounds out, shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Justin Bour strikes out swinging.
Marcell Ozuna lines out sharply to shortstop Trea Turner.
Derek Dietrich flies out to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Adeiny Hechavarria flies out to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Tyler Moore replaces Dustin McGowan.
Tyler Moore doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Dee Gordon strikes out swinging.
J. T. Realmuto grounds out softly, pitcher Tanner Roark to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Christian Yelich grounds out, second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Giancarlo Stanton lines out to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Justin Bour grounds out softly, pitcher Tanner Roark to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Marcell Ozuna strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Enny Romero replaces Tanner Roark, batting 9th, replacing Stephen Drew.
Derek Dietrich hit by pitch.
Miami Marlins Manager Don Mattingly ejected by HP umpire Ron Kulpa.
Adeiny Hechavarria singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Bryce Harper. Derek Dietrich to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Miguel Rojas replaces Nick Wittgren.
Miguel Rojas grounds into a double play, shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman. Derek Dietrich to 3rd. Adeiny Hechavarria out at 2nd.
Dee Gordon strikes out swinging.
J. T. Realmuto homers (1) on a line drive to left field.
Christian Yelich singles on a line drive to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Pitching Change: Joe Blanton replaces Enny Romero, batting 9th.
Giancarlo Stanton flies out to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Justin Bour strikes out swinging.
Marcell Ozuna singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Adam Eaton. Christian Yelich to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Oliver Perez replaces Joe Blanton, batting 9th.
Derek Dietrich grounds out, second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Pitching Change: Blake Treinen replaces Oliver Perez, batting 9th, replacing Adam Lind.
Adeiny Hechavarria lines out to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ichiro Suzuki replaces A. J. Ramos.
Ichiro Suzuki strikes out swinging.
Dee Gordon singles on a ground ball to center fielder Adam Eaton.
With J. T. Realmuto batting, Dee Gordon advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
J. T. Realmuto singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Bryce Harper. Dee Gordon scores.
Christian Yelich strikes out swinging.
Trea Turner flies out sharply to center fielder Christian Yelich.
Adam Eaton pops out to shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria.
Bryce Harper flies out to left fielder Marcell Ozuna.
Daniel Murphy grounds out, second baseman Dee Gordon to first baseman Justin Bour.
Ryan Zimmerman homers (1) on a line drive to right center field.
Anthony Rendon flies out to center fielder Christian Yelich.
Jayson Werth grounds out, shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria to first baseman Justin Bour.
Matt Wieters singles on a ground ball to third baseman Derek Dietrich, deflected by pitcher Dan Straily.
Tanner Roark ground bunts into a force out, first baseman Justin Bour to shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria. Matt Wieters out at 2nd. Tanner Roark to 1st.
Trea Turner grounds into a double play, shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria to second baseman Dee Gordon to first baseman Justin Bour. Tanner Roark out at 2nd.
Adam Eaton walks.
Bryce Harper doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton. Adam Eaton scores.
Daniel Murphy singles on a line drive to center fielder Christian Yelich. Bryce Harper scores. Daniel Murphy to 2nd on the throw.
Ryan Zimmerman walks.
Anthony Rendon pops out to second baseman Dee Gordon.
Jayson Werth singles on a fly ball to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton. Daniel Murphy to 3rd. Ryan Zimmerman to 2nd.
Matt Wieters singles on a ground ball to left fielder Marcell Ozuna. Daniel Murphy scores. Ryan Zimmerman scores. Jayson Werth to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Dustin McGowan replaces Dan Straily, batting 9th.
Tanner Roark out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher J. Realmuto to second baseman Dee Gordon. Jayson Werth to 3rd. Matt Wieters to 2nd.
Trea Turner strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Nick Wittgren replaces Dustin McGowan, batting 9th, replacing Tyler Moore.
Adam Eaton doubles (2) on a ground ball to left fielder Marcell Ozuna.
Bryce Harper singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Christian Yelich. Adam Eaton scores.
Daniel Murphy lines out to left fielder Marcell Ozuna.
With Ryan Zimmerman batting, Bryce Harper caught stealing 2nd base, catcher J. T. Realmuto to second baseman Dee Gordon.
Ryan Zimmerman pops out to third baseman Derek Dietrich in foul territory.
Anthony Rendon called out on strikes.
Jayson Werth singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton.
Matt Wieters walks. Jayson Werth to 2nd.

Pitching Change: A. J. Ramos replaces Kyle Barraclough, batting 9th.
Anthony Rendon called out on strikes.
Jayson Werth pops out to second baseman Dee Gordon.
